title: 9.7 Inch iPad Pro Smart Keyboard Review
description:
http://www.apple.com/smart-keyboard/
The Smart Keyboard is a light, easy to use keyboard for the 9.7" iPad Pro. It uses the Smart Connector rather than Bluetooth which is much more common, but has many downsides.
